name: Personal Shield Generator
desc: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health . Recharges outside of danger.
notes:
The Personal Shield Generator is an item in Risk of Rain 2.
The item adds a passive shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of the player's max HP on top of their health.  


== Notes ==
Shields cannot be healed by conventional means, and will only replenish after avoiding damage for 7 seconds.
This item is affected by the  Shaped Glass. When the player's maximum health is halved, the amount of shields they gain is also reduced.
This item can benefit a player with  Transcendence, since it will increase the shield by a small degree.
However,  Transcendence's maximum health increase does not affect the amount of shield gained from this item.


== Tips ==
The extra shield is particularly useful with  Plasma Shrimp, as it can provide more reliable uptime of its effect.
